arts.ttl: Jamie Carragher goes WILD in Sky Sports studio as Liverpool stun Newcastle with dramatic 100th-minute winner after St James' Park thriller
arts.sum: Jamie Carragher could not contain himself as Liverpool snatched a 100th-minute winner at St James' Park, with footage of his euphoric reaction in the Sky Sports studio going viral.

arts.ttl: Jamie Carragher names Liverpool star who has been 'all over the place' after win at Newcastle - and identifies other player who has had 'really poor start'
arts.sum: Rio Ngumoha etched his name into Liverpool history on Monday night as he came off the bench to score a 100th-minute winner, becoming the club's youngest-ever goalscorer.

arts.ttl: Liverpool fans have a lot to say about Dominik Szoboszlai’s display at right-back against Newcastle United
arts.sum: 'Real Madrid bought the wrong right-back, didn’t they...?'

arts.ttl: Newcastle 2 Liverpool 3 – Instant Newcastle United fan/writer reaction
arts.sum: Newcastle 2 Liverpool 3 – Monday 25 August 2025 8pm Instant fan / writer reaction from some of our regular contributors on The Mag. Nat Seaton: ‘Hard to put into... You can click here to read the full article. Source

arts.ttl: Newcastle should bite the bullet with Alexander Isak after showdown Liverpool meeting
arts.sum: Alexander Isak missed Newcastle's barnstorming clash against potential suitors Liverpool as he pushes for a move to Anfield but there could still be a twist in the tale

arts.ttl: Newcastle 2-3 Liverpool: 16-year-old Ngumoha stuns 10-man Newcastle with 100th-minute winner
arts.sum: Sought-after forward Hugo Ekitike, who was in talks with a move to Newcastle earlier in the summer, gave Liverpool the lead with a well-placed finish after Ryan Gravenberch and Bruno Guimaraes earned both teams a goal in the first half. That didn’t stop the Premier League champions from taking a surprise lead, though, and amusingly, the goal came only seconds after Newcastle fans cheered sarcastically on the back of Dominik Szoboszlai kicking the ball out of play.

arts.ttl: Howe praises 'incredible' Newcastle performance in Liverpool loss
arts.sum: Newcastle manager Eddie Howe is full of praise for his side despite their 3-2 defeat to Liverpool at St James' Park, after the away side scored a 100th-minute winner.

arts.ttl: Arne Slot responds to Alexander Isak question by praising one Liverpool player after beating Newcastle United
Virgil van Dijk hails Rio Ngumoha’s ‘dream debut’ for Liverpool at Newcastle
arts.sum: The teenager came off the bench to score deep into stoppage time as the champions snatched a 3-2 victory at St James’ Park.

arts.ttl: Football can be a cruel game – Newcastle 2 Liverpool 3
